files.description: Markdown rendering utilities to build a consistent, schema-driven CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md with headings, tables, and examples.
Generated rubric document specifying inclusion/exclusion criteria, scoring dimensions (impact, relevance, authoritative media URLs, rights clarity), and tagging rules mapped to the taxonomy.
